body:
I am on El Capitain, have SIP disabled and set the paths as above. but still see the build error on master:

ERROR: /Users/alexeysimonov/dev/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:312:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/cc:logging_ops_genrule failed: bash failed: error executing command /bin/bash -c ... (remaining 1 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.AbnormalTerminationException: Process terminated by signal 5.
dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib
  Referenced from: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_root/9a8b7d02e7f6ce832d52efe09806ba70/execroot/tensorflow/bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/cc/ops/logging_ops_gen_cc
  Reason: image not found
/bin/bash: line 1: 15710 Trace/BPT trap: 5       bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/cc/ops/logging_ops_gen_cc bazel-out/local_darwin-py3-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops/logging_ops.h bazel-out/local_darwin-py3-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops/logging_ops.cc tensorflow/cc/ops/op_gen_overrides.pbtxt 0

Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
